messages.subject: stubborn ain't the half of it
messages.msgSnippet: I had to write about this cuz it is so cool.  We have been enjoying the cartoons now with our dd, especially Invader Zim which she loves, since you guys set us
messages.messageBody:
I had to write about this cuz it is so cool. We have been enjoying the
cartoons now with our dd, especially Invader Zim which she loves, since
you guys set us straight over the weekend. Well, we went to the bank
yesterday and one of the tellers gave her a little notepad. On the way
home my dd drew amazingly accurate pictures of Zim on several of those
little notepad sheets! From memory!! Over the last 2 days now she has
drawn almost all of the characters from that program, and is loving
it. She also found a cartoon drawing class offered at the library when
we were there last night, and signed up for it. This might not of
happened had we continued to try to curtail her cartoon interest. With
acceptance, it has opened doors. :-) We are amazed!!
I also wanted to add, I told my dh that I had put on the last post
that it wasn't a good idea to write a post when you were extremly
frustrated. He disagreed and said the only way he was able to get
his "mind shift" was by having people point out to him how such a
negative attitude was affecting his relationship with his dd. Thanks
again. This way of life never ceases to amaze me.
